title: Be Honest (Presented by Toyota): Amy Purdy
description: Paralympic silver medalist Amy Purdy joins Cari Champion in front of a live studio audience to discuss her journey in becoming a Paralympic athlete, her non-profit organization for adaptive sports athletes and much more.
